job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Upgrade is a fintech unicorn founded in 2017 In the last four years over 15 million people have applied for an Upgrade card or loan and we have delivered over 7 billion in affordable and responsible credit Our innovative Upgrade Card combines the flexibility of a credit card with the low cost of an installment loan Our latest offering Rewards Checking gives customers access to nofee checking accounts with 2 cash back rewards on common everyday spending Learn more about the teambrbrUpgrade has been named a Best Place to Work in the Bay Area by the San Francisco Business Times and Silicon Valley Business Journal 3 years in a row and received Best Company for Women and Best Company for Diversity awards from Comparably Upgrade has been included in the 2021 Inc 5000 list of the fastestgrowing private companies in Americabrbrstrong Responsibilities brbrstrongWe are looking for new team members who get excited about designing and implementing new and better products to join a team of 750 talented and passionate professionals Come join us if you like to tackle big problems and make a meaningful difference in peoples livesbrulliReporting to Upgrades Head of Decision Sciences this role willliliDevelop and implement statisticalmachine learning models for various business areas including Credit Risk Fraud Marketing and OperationsliliValidate models to identify factors that may affect model performanceliliActively research new tools and techniques available for model developmentliliCollaborate with various teams across Upgrade in model development process Operations Product Marketing and Credit Riskbrbrliulstrong Skills brstrongulliAdvanced Degree PhD or MS in Statistics Mathematics Data Sciences or a related quantitative disciplinelili13 years experience as a Data ScientistliliExperience andor strong interest in latest machine learning techniques Random Forest Gradient Boosted Trees etc strongly preferredliliProficient in Python andor R Python preferredliliAbility to write documentation and present analysis to people with different levels of expertise eg technical staff business leads etcliliDetail oriented and strong analytical skill setliliProactive driven and ability to work in a fast paced environmentliulBenefits  PerksbrulliDesigner office with amazing views of the bay liliComprehensive benefit package medical dental and beverages snacks and treatsliliIn office game rooms yoga room and abundance of lounge spaceliliMonthly social gatheringsliulWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusbrbrCalifornia Employee Privacy NoticebrbrEffective Date 112020brbrstrong Notice To Applicants For Employment Employees And Contractors brbrstrongThis California Employee Privacy Notice is intended to provide California consumers is extended including employment education credit and criminal history Data on work productivity and performance including hours worked electronic network activity and tasks performedbrulli Purposes
